slide.title: A Brief History of...

list.bullet: XML-RPC: UserLand Software, 1998 (Dave Winer, Don Box)
SOAP 1.1: Don Box, DevelopMentor; IBM; Microsoft; 2000
SOAP is no longer an acronym
Specs split into three logical parts (Intro, Core, Add-ins)
Based on XML Infoset rather than XML 1.0

slide.example:
"An XML document has an information set if it is well-formed and satisfies namespace constraints."
- XML Infoset spec
